TextLibrary.Text: No, no, NO! They are GONE! Somebody took my treasure!
No, no, NO! They are GONE! Somebody took my treasure!
No, no, NO! They are GONE! Somebody took my treasure!
No, no, NO! They are GONE! Somebody took my treasure!
We've got to track them down! Those jewels are worth more than the whole city of Hyaan.
We've got to track them down! Those jewels are worth more than the whole city of Hyaan.
We've got to track them down! Those jewels are worth more than the whole city of Hyaan.
We've got to track them down! Those jewels are worth more than the whole city of Hyaan.
We must go, go, GO! NOW!
We must go, go, GO! NOW!
We must go, go, GO! NOW!
We must go, go, GO! NOW!
